title: Snowdown Showdown Personal Shop
body:
I've been looking into the newest event coming up in LoL, which is the Snowdown Showdown.
In the personal shop section from 12/16- 12/30.  Are the skins that are in the shop all random or based on which champs that I've played the most?

replies.body:
No snowdown personal shop this year. The only things we can confirm are that:

- There are some kind of snowdown chests

- There will be a winter map

- There are a few snowdown skins

- No snowdown shop

I haven't seen any official announcements regarding any potential holiday events, so I don't have any information to offer at this time. I recommend keeping an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any official announcements regarding one.
WTF there is no personal shop? k riot u aren't getting my money after all lol
